subtitleNullable: FIFA players & stats from the last decade.
descriptionNullable:
### Context

Scraped from www.fifaindex.com. Stats from 2012 to 2021 (and to be updated annually).

### Content

* Every player available in FIFA 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20 and 21
* 60 attributs


* Player overall and potential, height, and weight (cm, Kg)
* Player preferred positions, weak foot, and skill moves (out of 5 stars)
* Player preferred foot (R/L)
* Player birthdate and age
* Player value and wage (€)
* Player Nation (position and kit number) and Club (position, kit number, date joined, and contract length)
* Player ball skills (ball control, dribbling)
* Player defense (marking, slide tackle, and stand tackle)
* Player mental (aggression, reactions, att. position, interceptions, vision, and composure)
* Player passing (crossing, short pass, and long pass)
* Player physical (acceleration, stamina, strength, balance, sprint speed, agility, and jumping)
* Player shooting (heading, shot power, finishing, long shot, curve, FK acc., penalties, and volleys)
* Goalkeeper (GK positioning, GK diving, GK kicking, and GK reflexes)
* Player Specialities
* Player traite
title: FIFA Players & Stats
subtitle: FIFA players & stats from the last decade.
description:
### Context

Scraped from www.fifaindex.com. Stats from 2012 to 2021 (and to be updated annually).

### Content

* Every player available in FIFA 12, 13, 14, 15, 16, 17, 18, 19, 20 and 21
* 60 attributs


* Player overall and potential, height, and weight (cm, Kg)
* Player preferred positions, weak foot, and skill moves (out of 5 stars)
* Player preferred foot (R/L)
* Player birthdate and age
* Player value and wage (€)
* Player Nation (position and kit number) and Club (position, kit number, date joined, and contract length)
* Player ball skills (ball control, dribbling)
* Player defense (marking, slide tackle, and stand tackle)
* Player mental (aggression, reactions, att. position, interceptions, vision, and composure)
* Player passing (crossing, short pass, and long pass)
* Player physical (acceleration, stamina, strength, balance, sprint speed, agility, and jumping)
* Player shooting (heading, shot power, finishing, long shot, curve, FK acc., penalties, and volleys)
* Goalkeeper (GK positioning, GK diving, GK kicking, and GK reflexes)
* Player Specialities
* Player traite
